Package com.example.as1.api

Interface IngredientApi

public interface IngredientApi
This interface defines the contract for interacting with the Ingredient API.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    retrofit2.Call<Ingredient>
    createIngredient(Ingredient newIngredient)
    Creates a new ingredient using the request body.
    retrofit2.Call<Void>
    deleteIngredient(Long id)
    Deletes an ingredient with the specified ID.
    retrofit2.Call<List<Ingredient>>
    getAllIngredients()
    Retrieves a list of all ingredients.
    retrofit2.Call<List<Ingredient>>
    GetAllIngredients()
    Retrieves a list of all ingredients.
    retrofit2.Call<Ingredient>
    getIngredient(Long id)
    Retrieves a specific ingredient by ID.
    retrofit2.Call<List<Ingredient>>
    getIngredientsForRecipe(int recipeId)
    Retrieves a list of ingredients for a specific recipe.

    Posts a new ingredient using the request body.

    updateIngredient(Long id, Ingredient updatedIngredient)
    Updates an existing ingredient with the specified ID using the request body.

  • Method Details

    • GetAllIngredients

      @GET("ingredient/all") retrofit2.Call<List<Ingredient>> GetAllIngredients()
      Retrieves a list of all ingredients.
      Returns:
      A Call object with a List of Ingredient.

    • PostIngredientByPath

      @POST("ingredient/post/{name}") retrofit2.Call<Ingredient> PostIngredientByPath(@Path("name") String name)
      Posts a new ingredient with the specified name using a path parameter
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ingredient to be posted.
      Returns:
      A Call object with the posted Ingredient.

    • PostIngredientByBody

      @POST("ingredient/post") retrofit2.Call<Ingredient> PostIngredientByBody(@Body Ingredient newIngredient)
      Posts a new ingredient using the request body.
      Parameters:
      newIngredient - The new Ingredient to be posted.
      Returns:
      A Call object with the posted Ingredient.

    • getIngredientsForRecipe

      @GET("/recipe/{recipeId}/ingredients") retrofit2.Call<List<Ingredient>> getIngredientsForRecipe(@Path("recipeId") int recipeId)
      Retrieves a list of ingredients for a specific recipe.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - The ID of the recipe for which ingredients are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      A Call object with a List of Ingredient for the specified recipe.

    • setQuantity

      @PUT("pantryIng/quantity/{userId}/{pantryIngId}/{quantity}") retrofit2.Call<Ingredient> setQuantity(@Path("userId") Long userId, @Path("pantryIngId") Long pantryIngId, @Path("quantity") int quantity)
      Sets the quantity of a pantry ingredient for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      pantryIngId - The ID of the pantry ingredient.
      quantity - The quantity to be set.
      Returns:
      A Call object with the updated Ingredient.

    • getAllIngredients

      @GET("ingredients") retrofit2.Call<List<Ingredient>> getAllIngredients()
      Retrieves a list of all ingredients.
      Returns:
      A Call object with a List of Ingredient.

    • getIngredient

      @GET("ingredient/{id}") retrofit2.Call<Ingredient> getIngredient(@Path("id") Long id)
      Retrieves a specific ingredient by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the ingredient to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A Call object with the retrieved Ingredient.

    • createIngredient

      @POST("ingredients/create") retrofit2.Call<Ingredient> createIngredient(@Body Ingredient newIngredient)
      Creates a new ingredient using the request body.
      Parameters:
      newIngredient - The new Ingredient to be created.
      Returns:
      A Call object with the created Ingredient.

    • updateIngredient

      @PUT("ingredient/update/{id}") retrofit2.Call<Ingredient> updateIngredient(@Path("id") Long id, @Body Ingredient updatedIngredient)
      Updates an existing ingredient with the specified ID using the request body.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the ingredient to be updated.
      updatedIngredient - The updated Ingredient object.
      Returns:
      A Call object with the updated Ingredient.

    • deleteIngredient

      @DELETE("ingredient/delete/{id}") retrofit2.Call<Void> deleteIngredient(@Path("id") Long id)
      Deletes an ingredient with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the ingredient to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A Call object representing the deletion operation.
